title: Definitions
context: PART I. CONDEMNATION OF PRIVATE PROPERTY ยง101-1 Definitions. In this part, except where the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;County&rdquo; means a county (except the county of Kalawao) and any agency of a county, including the board of water supply thereof, duly authorized to exercise the power of eminent domain. &ldquo;Plaintiff&rdquo; means the State or any county or the public utility or other authority duly authorized to exercise the power of eminent domain. &ldquo;State&rdquo; means the State or any agency of the State duly authorized to exercise the power of eminent domain. [L 1951, c 12, ยง1(a); RL 1955, ยง8-1; HRS ยง101-1] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted.
